title: Labor Day: Is Costco open? Will USPS, FedEx and UPS make deliveries? A guide to whether post offices, schools, banks and other services and stores are closed for Labor Day on Monday
text:

MarketWatch Picks: 3 things to buy — and 3 things not to buy — over Labor Day weekend

But at least one big-box store — Costco — will be closed, and there are certain federal offices and services that will also be observing the holiday.

Here's what you need to know about what's open and what's closed for Labor Day.

Are schools open on Labor Day?

Most public and private schools, if they are in session already, will be closed on Labor Day Monday. But check your school district calendar to be sure.

Related: Stung by inflation, parents flock to back-to-school community 'supply drives' for notebooks, pens and clothing

Will post offices be open, and do FedEx and UPS deliver on Labor Day?

Post offices will be closed on Monday, Sept. 5 to observe Labor Day, and the United States Postal Service will not be delivering regular mail or packages.

But those with a USPS.com account can still order stamps, print shipping labels and order mailing supplies like boxes online.

Related: Gas prices are falling ahead of Labor Day — here's what could reverse the trend

FedEx FDX and UPS UPS also will not be making deliveries on Labor Day, except for critical deliveries. UPS office locations will be closed, and most FedEx locations will also shut down, although a few may be open with modified hours. Reach out to your local FedEx store to make sure.

Are banks open on Labor Day?

Federal reserve banks will be closed on Monday, Sept. 5 for Labor Day. And most bank branches will also be closed, although ATMs and mobile banking apps should still be offering some services, so check with your banking institution.

Is the stock market open on Labor Day?

The U.S. stock marketSPX will also be closed on Monday, Sept. 5 in observance of Labor Day.

Read more: Is the stock market closed on Labor Day?

Are pharmacies open on Labor Day?

Many pharmacies are open, yet operating with modified hours, so check your local listings. As far as the big chains go, CVS CVS and Walgreens WBA will be open — but again, check their hours.

Is Costco open on Labor Day?

No, Costco Wholesale Corp. COST closes its warehouse stores on several holidays, including Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day and Christmas Day — although you can still shop Costco online, of course. But rival big-box retailers like Sam's Club, Target TGT, Walmart WMT, Lowe's LOW and Home Depot HD will open their doors on Labor Day Monday. Hours may vary by location, so check each company's website.
